nodes.text: 4-LB was an unenthusiastic labor droid who ran the Power Station at Mos Eisley, where locals came to power their speeders and equipment. It cared little about its customers and their whereabouts.
Tatooine Manhunt describes 4-LB as a labor droid, while Galaxy Guide 7: Mos Eisley refers to the droid as a power droid.
